price: 49. Kaadu Nabii Muusak iyyeenih kee a baab-abeynaw ku- Rabbi neh kaliac a- digaalá nek kalaamah ku- garil-le xagnal, diggah nanu tirri axcennok (aaminennok)”.
arabic: وَقَالُواْ يَٰٓأَيُّهَ ٱلسَّاحِرُ ٱدۡعُ لَنَا رَبَّكَ بِمَا عَهِدَ عِندَكَ إِنَّنَا لَمُهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: waqālū yāayyuha al-sāḥiru ud'ʿu lanā rabbaka bimā ʿahida ʿindaka innanā lamuh'tadūna
